name: StickDose
description:
Part of GMTK game jam!

Your truck broke down in the dessert while on the toilet... Can you put it back together?

Why is it called StickDose?
It's pronounced the same way as "stikdåse" which is the Danish word for power strip. A hint to the work you'll be doing in the game!

The game has a few missing things. Most notably a start menu and proper ending. Once you get the car going and turn around the corner, you can consider the game completed! Good luck!
